mapper.select: SELECT d.qna_no AS qnano, d.customer_no AS customerno, d.board_type AS boardtype, d.title, d.content, d.reg_date AS regdate, d.admincontent, d.adminregdate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rw, c.qna_no, c.customer_no, c.board_type, c.title, c.content, c.reg_date, c.admincontent, c.adminregdate FROM ( SELECT a.qna_no, a.customer_no, a.board_type, a.title, a.content, a.reg_date, b.content AS admincontent, b.reg_date AS adminregdate FROM qna a LEFT OUTER JOIN qna_comment b ON a.qna_no = b.qna_no ORDER BY a.qna_no DESC ) c ) d WHERE rw > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND rw <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna ( qna_no , customer_no , board_type , title , content ) VALUES ( seq_qna_no.NEXTVAL , #{customerNo} , #{boardType} , #{title} , #{content} )
INSERT INTO qna_comment ( QNA_NO , CONTENT , REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{qnANo}, #{content}, sysdate )
